contentfulPagePressRelease.title: Local Community Enjoys Weekend of NRC Activities

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Families enjoyed a number of fun and educational National Reading Campaign activities at The Mall over the weekend.

Qatar Foundation (QF) welcomed children and parents to its interactive booth, from Thursday to Saturday, with participants taking part in a range of fun-filled and engaging activities designed to foster a love of reading from an early age.

The schedule included themed storytelling; games, such as oversized jigsaws; and book swaps.

pageContext.title: Local Community Enjoys Weekend of NRC Activities
